title: Galaxy Cluster
explanation: A beautiful galaxy cluster captured by the Hubble telescope.

title: Nebula Explosion
explanation: A colorful nebula explosion in deep space.

title: Star Formation
explanation: Stars being born in a dense cloud of gas and dust.

title: Andromeda Galaxy
explanation: The closest spiral galaxy to our Milky Way.

title: Supernova Remnant
explanation: The remains of a massive star that exploded.

title: Planetary Nebula
explanation: A glowing shell of ionized gas ejected from red giant stars.

title: Comet Trail
explanation: A comet passing close to the Sun leaving a spectacular trail.

title: Milky Way Core
explanation: The dense, bright core of our galaxy.

title: Aurora Borealis
explanation: Northern lights dancing across the polar skies.

title: Mars Surface
explanation: A breathtaking view of the red planet's terrain.

title: Jupiter Storm
explanation: The giant storm on Jupiter, known as the Great Red Spot.

title: Saturn Rings
explanation: The beautiful rings of Saturn captured in detail.

title: Lunar Surface
explanation: Craters and mountains on the Moon's surface.

title: Venus Cloud Tops
explanation: The thick, cloudy atmosphere of Venus.

title: Solar Prominence
explanation: A dramatic loop of plasma erupting from the Sun.

title: Eclipse Shadow
explanation: The Moon casting its shadow during a solar eclipse.

title: Asteroid Belt
explanation: A cluster of rocky objects orbiting the Sun between Mars and Jupiter.

title: Exoplanet Transit
explanation: A distant planet passing in front of its host star.

title: Black Hole Accretion
explanation: Matter swirling around a black hole emitting powerful energy.

title: Cosmic Nebula
explanation: A colorful nebula formed by gases and dust in space.
